amendment.description: To require financial institutions and other users of consumer reports to provide notice to appropriate Federal agencies in cases in which consumer information is compromised.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2064 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2064 proposed by Senator Corzine. (consideration: CR S13884-13885; text: CR S13884) To require financial institutions and other users of consumer reports to provide notice to appropriate Federal agencies in cases in which consumer information is compromised.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2064 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2064 proposed by Senator Corzine.
